Reviews.Title: Great everyday computer.
Reviews.Author: Carlos Maldonado
Reviews.Content: So far the computer is working great. Is a little heavy than I though. This computer is a gift (Wife) so I haven't got the time to actually tested very good so the rate can change at any moment. I got a code for Windows, is a 25$ for their apps store. The AMD Radeon HD 8400 graphics is plenty for her.Pros:Windows load fast. We have to considered that is a new Windows with not that many programs installed. Further testing is needed.The touch screen is great for windows 8, I think that is a must have for Windows 8.Is a complete  keyboard (number pad) and it feels OK.Everything is working at is should be. No issues with the product.Camera is good. It works really well with Skype.the material of the laptop does not feel cheap so that is good for me.It have a good processor for everyday routine (office programs, web, skype).6GB of ram, that is plenty of memory.Cons:A little loud on the fan side. I haven't play with the settings on the HP coolsenseA little heavy. This is a  present for my wife.Possible updates that would increase performance:-I think that with an SSD drive this computer should be great.Overall:Is an excellent everyday computer programs, web, skype and so on (so far, I need to do more testing that is why I only gave it 4 stars). I don't spec for this computer to run the latest game because is not for that, but actually I think it can run them but in low.Update on the review coming soon.Update1: I had said that the code that I got was for Windows 8.1 but is just a $25 giftcard from Windows. Doing some updates now to the computer, it keeps responding very good.Update 2: Installed windows 8.1, nice upgrade and all the normal apps. This computer have the availability to go from tablet to PC and PC to tablet. Again the touch screen on windows 8 for me is a must have. Windows 8 learning curve is not too hard. It would let you run two application on one screen, for example, need to write a paper of a video or book, you can have the video or book open on one side of the screen and word open in the other side. You can also determinate the size of each side, so the important program can be bigger.Computer keeps running great, I haven't install any games but again is not for me and is not for that either.Fan noise when down.

Reviews.Title: My gift to myself
Reviews.Author: SMF
Reviews.Content: Great laptop- I am going from a PC with Windows XP so I am fumbling my way around but I like it. It works great! Love the touch feature too!

Reviews.Title: Great PC for the price with touch screen
Reviews.Author: M. Carreon "Audio Visualization"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom who isn't very good with PCs. I figured a quad core would be a good standard to begin with. It comes with all the normal connections one needs for today's use. I found the touch screen itself very useful to move around the PC while setting it up. 15.6" screen size is perfect for a laptop, any larger and the PC becomes less portable. It turns out she loves it because she doesn't need to use a mouse. The 4gig memory is a bit of a let down but I plan to upgrade it i the near future to 8gig. I have family members were impressed with the specs and price of this PC. HP doesn't sell physical backup DVDs for this PC. However, you are able to create a backup at home. you have a choice between DVD, DVD DL, or USB. It stated I would require at least 24G of space so a 32G USB would be the way to go. I didn't have one at the time, so I had to use 5 DVDs, not the best media to backup a PC.

Reviews.Title: Laptop Review
Reviews.Author: Larry A.
Reviews.Content: The HP Pavilion Laptop Computer has also proven to be a wonderful Christmas gift !  My wife is very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Working great 6 months later
Reviews.Author: Seattle Mama
Reviews.Content: My 24 year old loves this computer. Must be a fan of Windows 8 or you might not enjoy it as much. This was an affordable laptop purchase for us. He is watching a lot of movies on it and the streaming is great. No complaints, HP has always been a reliable brand for us.

Reviews.Title: really good
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "Sparky"
Reviews.Content: It works very nicely, I love the touch screen. Clear image very reliable. Just what ii wanted.Hp is a good machine.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Present
Reviews.Author: Penny Egly
Reviews.Content: Got it for my son ....it is everything he wanted..... it's everything you said it was .....price was perfect thank you!

Reviews.Title: Student Computer
Reviews.Author: GAD "bogeyman62"
Reviews.Content: I am using this for college work. It is lite and easy to use. Windows 8.1 is also easy to use with a little effort to learn it.  I love the touch screen and the HDMI port is great for watching videos on my HD TV.

Reviews.Title: nice backup computer
Reviews.Author: Sparky
Reviews.Content: I like the laptop for a backup computer. I dont do anything really big on it so it works good for what I use it for. checking emails and playing games. If i want to do major research or work I still use my big desktop.

Reviews.Title: Good price, fast shipping and looks great
Reviews.Author: Chelsy Alamina
Reviews.Content: Just as big as I wanted it to be and the shipping was fast. The reason I'm giving 4 stars is because after I had registered it and updated and played around with it a bit, the touch screen stopped working. However, after turning it off and leaving it to sit for a few hours it was back to normal. Everything else works fine and is perfect. Shipping package was protected and good. Everything was included.

Reviews.Title: My first laptop.
Reviews.Author: Tracey E Priddy
Reviews.Content: This laptop is my first and I love it.  The touchscreen is great to use and makes most navigating a lot easier.  I would swear the description said the keyboard was backlit and it isn't, so I was extremely disappointed by that.  I use this computer for email, facebook, paying bills, writing letters, and playing games.  Battery life is good although games do wear it down more quickly as you would expect.

Reviews.Title: Best laptop ever
Reviews.Author: Elessar Books "Elessar Books"
Reviews.Content: the touchscreen makes a world of difference when using Windows 8.So, this pair is a match made in  Heaven.I reccommend it.

Reviews.Title: Nice laptop
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: This lap top was as advertised. The touch screen is easy to use. Took me some time to learn Windows 8...Tony

Reviews.Title: Software glitch or a Defective piece
Reviews.Author: Vikas Kumar
Reviews.Content: I purchased it on Thanksgiving 2013 and started using couple of days ago only.  The System behaves mischievously. It automatically clicks applications, zoom in and zoom out applications,mouse clicks on its own etc... Even after HP online support of re-installing Windows, the problem persisted.HP Support team informed me that that it could be a software glitch and they remotely connected to this machine , re-installed the windows 8 and at that time it appeared to be working fine but after an hour or so the machine behaved same as before.I am not sure if it's software glitch or a defective piece .As my experience with this machine is not pleasant ,I decided to return it .

Reviews.Title: Laptop Great, Windows 8 not so much
Reviews.Author: John Klang
Reviews.Content: Old guy frustrated with having to stumble around a new operating system.  Do descendants of Marquis DeSade develop new software?  Geeeeeez..................................

Reviews.Title: HP Pavilion a good choice
Reviews.Author: Serena S. Major
Reviews.Content: i bought this for my son's Christmas present and he loves it  he finds no faultwith it considering it is still a little early to comment but for now it is great

Reviews.Title: Great for School and Social Media
Reviews.Author: DanC
Reviews.Content: I got this for my nephew.  He needed a laptop for school as a freshman in H.S.  He wanted the touch screen along with windows 8, a good processor and plenty of memory.  The HP has done everything he wanted it to do.

Reviews.Title: better then expected
Reviews.Author: MILAN
Reviews.Content: So far so good! I got this from one of Amazon's special sales. (During Thanksgiving weekend) I wasn't expecting much, but so far everything is working as it should. I did upgrade to Windows 8.1.

Reviews.Title: Failed in three days actually produced smoke, took almost a week to get reply back from HP, Amazon had aldready supported me
Reviews.Author: kenneth raines
Reviews.Content: Unit failed within three days of use, smoke emitted from the area of the power switch.  Technical support from HP escalated it to a safety hazard, I was told I would be contacted with 24 hours, I called back after no reply and the delay started over again, The HP call centers were less than adequate, I would have been embarrassed to be employed by HP.On the other hand, I contacted Amazon support and they were excellent with their support in helping me return the product

Reviews.Title: Standard computer for multi-purpose and average users
Reviews.Author: Amanda Scott
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant about HP because I had read so many bad reviews about them frying or overheating after a few months. I got mine on Cyber Monday and it is still working great. Never have any problems with the touch screen (other than getting dirty from use), it's pretty average in weight and the speed is fair for someone like me who uses it for about 3-4 hours a day for homework, multi-tab research and browsing. Streaming quality isn't FANTASTIC, but it definitely beats my bulky 8 year old Toshiba.My only prob was with the Windows 8.1 upgrade. (Not the laptop). Before you agree to doing the upgrade, make sure that you look up how to get rid of the Windows 8 data (previous versions). The update didn't replace my old system but instead added a whole other OS. Eventually I will figure it out without being in fear of deleting something essential from my system, but for now having both Windows 8 and 8.1 on my laptop is slowing it down a bit.Overall it's a great laptop so far and it definitely serves its purpose and then some. Touch screen was a nice convenient extra that ultimately led me to purchasing THIS laptop rather than another Toshiba. Makes use of Windows 8/ 8.1 much easier. I'm glad I went with my gut and gave HP a chance.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop for the price
Reviews.Author: Dennis Hunter
Reviews.Content: Works great, The fan is a little loud at times, but for the most part it is a good laptop.

Reviews.Title: Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Arloeen M. Sciaroni
Reviews.Content: This has been a challenge for this senior citizen, BUT, I am catching on and enjoying my new laptop.  This was a great gift to me.

Reviews.Title: Decent touch screen laptop
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Value for money. Even though bit heavier, this is very good laptop for the price. Having touch screen is great as so far I did not find any issues.

Reviews.Title: Nice laptop. More than i expected for the price
Reviews.Author: Carlos Manzueta
Reviews.Content: I bought it in a lightning deal on black friday for 380.00 Dollars and this computer is impressive for that price. Pretty fast and love the touchscreen feature. I saw other reviewers telling that the cursor goes to the right corner it happened one time for me and i just touched the screen and that was it, no need to restart or nothing and never happened again in my case.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic laptop
Reviews.Author: JM
Reviews.Content: I got this laptop for my son for Christmas and so far....excellent! The touchscreen is such a great feature. The keyboard is sleek and responds well. The resolution is top-notch and runs Windows 8. I've tried several different brands of laptops over the years and so far the HP looks like a great buy.

Reviews.Title: simply fun
Reviews.Author: F. Butler "The truth shall set you free."
Reviews.Content: The laptop is the right size, simple yet elegant design, runs well and has touch screen functionality all at at a great price. It does everything I need it to do.

Reviews.Title: Dead Out of Box
Reviews.Author: Dale Tingley
Reviews.Content: The laptop was dead out of the box x-mas morning. I know it happens (it's technology) but it still sucked.  That is why it got 1 star.

Reviews.Title: HP touchsmart
Reviews.Author: Linda Bondy "Linda b"
Reviews.Content: So far I am really enjoying this computer.  A touch screen was not a priority; but it fell within my price range so I got it.  It is so easy to navigate.  I can use the manual keyboard, or the on screen touch keyboard.  I can use a mouse or the touch pad.  I am still tryin to get used to Windows 8 as I had XP for many years.  That is just me.  I have already installed my wireless printer, I can use the lap top in any room, or take it with me and use wi fi or hook onto a wireless router at my son's or daughter's houses.  Colors are bright, the screen images are clear and bright. Has enough memory for my use.  I don't play a lot of games; but my grandsons have played a few and it is great. I am happy with my decision on this HP TouchSmart.

Reviews.Title: Great investment!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas
Reviews.Content: It's fast and easy to. I love windows 8. No regrets except my cousin had the same laptop and I didn't know!

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price
Reviews.Author: S. Schultz
Reviews.Content: Only disappointment is that there is no keyboard button to turn off the touchpad.Upgraded to Windows 8.1 without any problems.  Like the way the computer is automatically synced with my mobile device.
